attributes.action: withdraw Britain's support of, and reject, the unfair and unjust Treaty of Trianon which severed the Kingdom (now Republic) of Hungary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Treaty of Trianon unjustly broke off historically Hungarian territories, and isolated millions of Hungarians, in the name of "self-determination", not to mention creating many smaller, more corrupt states.
